Name: cement production, Portland | cement, Portland | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster
Description: In this dataset, the production of CEM I is described, where clinker (91.9%) is ground together with gypsum (4.99%) and mixed with limestone (0.98%). The activity includes also the input of electricity used for the grinding of the clinker and grinding aids (ethylene glycol and iron sulfate).
